sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card     
    class="mx-auto my-10"
    max-width="600"
    title="plantInfo.name"
    >
    <v-card-text>
      This is content
    </v-card-text>
    </v-card>
</template>
<script>

import { defineComponent, computed } from 'vue';
import { useRouter } from 'vue-router';
import { useStore } from 'vuex';


export default defineComponent({

  setup() {
    const router = useRouter();
    const store = useStore();

    const plantType = computed(() => router.params.type)
    const plantInfo = computed(() => store.state.typesPlants.find(item => item.type === plantType));
    console.log(plantType)
    return { plantInfo };
  },
}) 

</script>
<style scoped>
    
</style>
